name: Digit Connect
description:
Swap two adjacent blocks, by dragging one block over the other, to make a horizontal or vertical sequence before time runs out.

A sequence may read from either left-to-right, right-to-left, top-to-bottom or bottom-to-top. Time is replenished on each successful match

For example: 123 / 654 / 678 etc

See How to Play for details.
